member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Json.AbpJsonOptions.DefaultDateTimeFormat
member.summary: Used to set default value for the DateTimeFormat.

member.name: P:Volo.Abp.Json.AbpJsonOptions.UseHybridSerializer
member.summary: It will try to use System.Json.Text to handle JSON if it can otherwise use Newtonsoft. Affects both AbpJsonModule and AbpAspNetCoreMvcModule. See
